author: Hannah Bleau
title: Hillary Clinton Peddles Voting Reform: ‘We Need to Act Now’
description: Hillary Clinton on Wednesday renewed her calls for voting reform, warning that the United States needs to "act now" in order to ensure that citizens can "safely cast a ballot in November" as members of her party eagerly pursue universal mail-in voting.
content:
Hillary Clinton on Wednesday renewed her calls for voting reform, warning that the United States needs to “act now” in order to ensure that citizens can “safely cast a ballot in November” as members of her party eagerly pursue universal mail-in voting.
